name: ALOpsAppValidation
description: Validate App from Business Central AppSource
author: Hodor
helpMarkDown: Validate App from Business Central AppSource.

inputs.name: license_path
inputs.label: FLF Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the FLF license to import. Must be a fully qualified path or relative to $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory) or a downloadable Url. $(license_path) $(license_path) $(license_path)

inputs.name: countries
inputs.label: Countries
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma seperated array of countries to validate. When blank SupportedCountries value from AppSourceCop.json is used. $(countries) $(countries) $(countries)

inputs.name: affixes
inputs.label: Affixes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma seperated array of affixes. $(affixes) $(affixes) $(affixes)

inputs.name: artifact_path
inputs.label: App(s) Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path for App Artifact(s). $(artifact_path) $(artifact_path) $(artifact_path)

inputs.name: artifact_filter
inputs.label: App filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filter used for locating App file relative to $(artifact_path). $(artifact_filter) $(artifact_filter) $(artifact_filter)

inputs.name: installapps_path
inputs.label: Install App(s) Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path for InstallApps Artifact(s). $(installapps_path) $(installapps_path) $(installapps_path)

inputs.name: installapps_filter
inputs.label: App filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filter used for locating App file relative to $(installapps_path). $(installapps_filter) $(installapps_filter) $(installapps_filter)

inputs.name: previousapps_path
inputs.label: Previous App(s) Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path for PreviousApps Artifact(s). $(previousapps_path) $(previousapps_path) $(previousapps_path)

inputs.name: previousapps_filter
inputs.label: App filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filter used for locating App file relative to $(previousapps_path). $(previousapps_filter) $(previousapps_filter) $(previousapps_filter)

inputs.name: memory
inputs.label: Docker Memory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set maximum memory for Container. $(memory) $(memory) $(memory)

inputs.name: validateversion
inputs.label: Validate Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full or partial version number. If specified, apps will also be validated against this version. $(validateversion) $(validateversion) $(validateversion)

inputs.name: validatecurrent
inputs.label: Validate Current
inputs.helpMarkDown: Validate against current version of Business Central. $(validatecurrent) $(validatecurrent) $(validatecurrent)

inputs.name: validatenextminor
inputs.label: Validate Next Minor
inputs.helpMarkDown: Validate against Next Minor version of Business Central. $(validatenextminor) $(validatenextminor) $(validatenextminor)

inputs.name: validatenextmajor
inputs.label: Validate Next Major
inputs.helpMarkDown: Validate against Next Major version of Business Central. $(validatenextmajor) $(validatenextmajor) $(validatenextmajor)

inputs.name: sastoken
inputs.label: SAS Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: SAS Token used to access Storage Account. $(sastoken) $(sastoken) $(sastoken)

inputs.name: skipverification
inputs.label: Skip Verification
inputs.helpMarkDown: $(skipverification) $(skipverification) $(skipverification)

inputs.name: skipupgrade
inputs.label: Skip Upgrade
inputs.helpMarkDown: $(skipupgrade) $(skipupgrade) $(skipupgrade)

inputs.name: skipappsourcecop
inputs.label: Skip AppSourceCop
inputs.helpMarkDown: $(skipappsourcecop) $(skipappsourcecop) $(skipappsourcecop)

inputs.name: skipconnectiontest
inputs.label: Skip Connection Test
inputs.helpMarkDown: $(skipconnectiontest) $(skipconnectiontest) $(skipconnectiontest)

inputs.name: includewarnings
inputs.label: Include Warnings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include this switch if you want to include Warnings. $(includewarnings) $(includewarnings) $(includewarnings)

inputs.name: failonerror
inputs.label: Fail on Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include this switch if you want to fail on the first error instead of returning all errors to the caller. $(failonerror) $(failonerror) $(failonerror)

inputs.name: containername
inputs.label: Container Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Only required when running multiple DevOps Agents on the same server. (Not recommended) $(containername) $(containername) $(containername)
